Key:
Phew, another day I've arrived home safe. Peaceful
days are the best.

(I feel like my day suddenly started with my return
home. I have no idea what I did all day today... But I
guess it was just that peaceful.)
I'm home! Oh... No one's home?

Hehe. You're late, my dear brother Shido. Where were
you killing time?

Long awaited. We were waiting for you, Shido. Dinner
is also ready.

Huh? Kaguya and Yuzuru? Why are you guys here...?
Did you just call me brother?
Hm. What's the matter, Shido? You seem spacey today.

I agree. Could you be tired, Shido? If there is
something to worry about, please tell your older
sister, Yuzuru.

Wait. Kaguya is my little sister and Yuzuru is my
older sister...? Oh, that's right. You two are my
family.
Agreed. That is it exactly. What about it?

Oh, nothing. I just felt like something was off for
some reason.

Gosh, Shido. What is up with you? How long do you
want to make me wait in this neverending abyss?
Huh? What about a neverending abyss?

Clarification. Kaguya is simply hungry. Her stomach
was growling as she waited for you.

N-Nuh-uh! It's a neverending abyss! The boiling chaos
was losing its heat, and I couldn't just let it die.

The boiling chaos...? Judging by the smell... Ah, I see.
You made hot pot tonight. And that's why you were
waiting for me to come home, huh?

Sorry for taking so long, Kaguya, Yuzuru-onesan.
I'm home.

H-Hmph. I am going to offer you this steaming
hot sacrifice. You best be thankful.
Returning the respect. Welcome home, Shido.

(I sensed that something was different, but I guess
we're a family... Nothing's wrong with that, right?)

Anyways, I'm going to go to my room and change. I'll
be right back, so wait for me in the living room,
okay?
Understood. We'll be waiting.

...Suggestion. Shido, let me take your bag. I'm sure
it'll be in your way as you remove your shoes.

Ah! No fair, Yuzuru! And you're going to follow him to
his room, aren't you?! I'll hold Shido's bag!

Objection. Kaguya, I have no idea what you're talking
about. This is my job as Shido's older sister. Kaguya,
why don't you go skim off the scum from the hot pot?
Grrr! That is mine! It's my job!

Hahaha... I'm fine alone, so you guys wait for me in
the living room, yeah?
Grr, if you say so.

Understood. Very well. Then I'll return to the living
room.

...Phew. Jeez, I just barely escaped that one. I know
they're my family and all, but it's a real challenge
sometimes.

(I guess this is what you call a brother complex?
They're both like this, so sometimes it gets tiring,
but they're usually so cute and kind.)

Not so much lately as they've been more aggressive,
but I guess all is well.

Shido! I am tired of waiting! Come forth like the swift
gales of the mighty sea!
...Oh, crap. I'll be right over!

(I thought I had calmed things down from earlier, but
I guess I was wrong.)

Mm... It's almost morning. I somehow feel so much
pressure already.
Zzz...zzz....
Kuuuu...kuuuu.

...Something's off. I hear something. My instinct is
telling me to ignore it, but I feel something heavy...

No point in staying in denial. I'm going to check! I'm
going to face reality!

...How do I put this? My fear was real. I kind of wished
I was wrong.
...What am I supposed to do?
Mmm, Shido...
Breathe... zzzz...

(...Let me officially introduce my family. These two
sleeping here are my little sister Kaguya and my
older sister Yuzuru.)

They're both totally in love with me, and whenever I
let my guard down, I wake up like this. Jeez, they're
so much trouble... Hahaha.

(...Now isn't the time to be explaining it! I was so
taken aback that I threw in all this exposition.)

Damn it. You guys. I saw you two go into your room
last night. No wonder you were weirdly compliant...

You guys aren't at the ages where this should still
be happening. Come on. Can you not come into my
bed while I'm sleeping?

No matter how many times I tell you, you never listen.
Damn it. What am I, your body pillow?!

(And we're of age. I don't want something bad to
happen. But they totally ignore me. Am I the one in
the wrong here?)

No, that can't be. If they wake up, it's not going to
end well. I wonder if I can get out before they do...
Shido... You come to me... Zzz.
Correction... Come closer to Yuzuru... Kuu.

No...! I'm being pinned from both sides by something
super soft.

(No... Every time they move, it just gets worse. And
they're totally holding my arms down. I need to get
out, or I'm not gonna last.)

If I move, they'll wake up. I have to get out in a way
that won't wake them.

(Okay... Should I start with my right arm or my left
arm? If one side's free, I'm sure it'll be easier for
me to take out the other side.)

(Patience is key. If I rush things, it'll lead to disaster.
Stay calm. Think.)
(Do I start with Kaguya or Yuzuru? The answer is...)
Kaguya, you're it!
Yuzuru, I choose you!

If I'm level-headed about it, my analysis should yield
the best answer. I'll get Kaguya off me first...!

I guess on Kaguya's side, I feel less pressure on my
arm. I mean... she has a smaller chest.
Huh?! ...*sniffle*.
(Huh? Did she hear me? No, that can't be...)
*Whimper*... Shido. So messed up... Zzzzz.

Ah, she's sleeping. But for some reason, she looks
sad. I feel guilty now...

(N-No. This isn't the time to feel guilty! I need to
get out of this situation. Remember, I'm a prisoner
stuck between my two sisters.)

(I can't let emotion drive my decisions. If I do,
Ragnarok awaits.)

...No, this isn't good, I'm off my game now. Kaguya's
thing's a little distracting. I've graduated from this.

Kaguya sometimes looks at me with sparkly eyes
and says, Brother, let's talk about the good old

Operator: times and the dark days," but I can't go back."

Key:
(...Stop. Although I have sympathy toward my family,
I need to be level-headed. I must suppress my emotions
and get Kaguya off me first!)

(So I guess I can move my arm... Take it slow. Really
slow.)
Mmm...

(*Grunt*... She's clinging on so desperately. Like
she's actually denying my escape.)

Calm down. I still have a chance. If I move slowly, I
should be able to get free.
(Take it slow. Really slow.)
F-Fweee...
(C-Crap! My arm is grazing Kaguya's nose...!)
...A-CHOO!
(It's over... It's all over.)

Yuzuru-onesan seems to be a bit more reserved, and
her grip is weaker.
(I have to take advantage of that.)

Yuzuru-onesan, I'm going to move you a bit. She
seems to be in a deep sleep, so I should be fine,
right?
Mmmmm.
Ouhh!

(The moment I tried to slip out, she pushed her chest
further into me?!)

...C-Crap. I couldn't help but make a weird noise. I
feel like I touched something super soft... but it was
an accident.
Request... Shido, more...
(...?! What is she saying?!)

...She's sleeping, right? Yeah she is. I want to
believe that she is.

(But still, my situation isn't good. I-I guess I'll try one
more time. I'll be careful, like threading a needle...)
Mmmm...mmm.
Aieee!

(N-No. Every time I get closer to freedom, her
chest... Yuzuru-onesan, this is a perfect trap you've
set. You're scary!)
Hehe... Are you done checking?
Huh, wait... Yuzuru-onesan, are you awake?
What's going on, you guys?
Awoken. Good morning, Shido.
Ah, the bright light. What a refreshing awakening.

(This is the worst. I couldn't even escape before they
woke up. I have no choice but to run for it when I
have the chance.)

H-Hey, you two. Morning. Why are you guys in my
bed?

Hehe... You were so cold last night. So we decided
to balance you out.

Agreed. We snuck in last night. Shido, you are in our
joint custody.

Oh, I see. Is that so? You guys are such trouble.
Anyways... I'm going to go make breakfast...
AH!

Hehe... I won't let you get away... I'm not satisfied
yet!

Warning. I suggest you give up and stay still until
Yuzuru is satisfied. That is an older sister's
orders.

Hehe. Shido. Yahh. Ahhh, I'm not going to move for
another 30 minutes.

Agreed. Hehe. I guess I'll let you have the other
side, Kaguya.
*Grunt*... I can't run. Someone! Help me!
(Another day when my sisters toy with me... *sigh*...)
